_header: Stroke owl and scrape owl and ever is owl owl
_description: A proverb in Nicholas Bozon’s Contes moralisés

Owst,  Gerald Robert.

         Cambridge: UP, 1933: 44.

GraysInn12.Transcription: Stroke oule & schrape oule& euer is oule oule
GraysInn12.Note: Written as prose, lines 4-5 on folio.
